summary:
Graduated from the faculty of medicine, Suez Canal university, Ismailia, Egypt (2008), obtained 
Masters in Cardiology from same institution (2014), Has Diploma of advanced Master of Medical imaging from Leuven, Belgium (2017). Completed cardiology training and obtained Doctorate degree in Cardiology (Egypt and Belgium, 2020). Clinical research in Gasthuisberg hospital (KU-Leuven, 2016-2018). From 2020 till now: PhD candidate in Maastricht university, Clinical research in Maastricht academic hospital (MUMC+) and in Jessa Hospital, Hasselt, Belgium. Certified from the American board 
of Echocardiography (2021). Registered in The Egyptian medical syndicate as consultant-C (2020) and in the order der artsen, RIZIV/INAMI in Belgium (2022).

https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=L2Lz4ogAAAAJ&hl=en

https://www.researchgate.net/profile/Ahmed-Beela

https://orcid.org/0000-0003-0517-7000
